name: Join Me In Dystopia, Pirate!
description:
A top-down shooter roguelike game themed after pirates and their fabled haven - Libertalia. Shoot, plunder and loot as you go along the randomly generated world killing wreaking havoc.

In a pirates's world, life is all about money (or booty as they call it). If you lose your money, you lose your life, so take what you can, give nothing back!

(Made for the 7DRL 2022 Challenge)
